text: @Minuteman04 I am SO grateful I MOVED from Texas because @GregAbbott_TX is an idiot!  My current @CAgovernor  @GavinNewsom is doing an AWESOME, aggressive job looking out for the citizens! @realDonaldTrump is a #covid19 #FailureInChief #TrumpLiedPeopleDied
